data.title: Best Movies Like Arnold's Wrecking Co.
meta_keywords: movies similar to Arnold's Wrecking Co.
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Arnold's Wrecking Co.: Ripped (2017), How High 2 (2019), High Road (2011), Getting Doug with High (2013), High Society: A Pot Boiler (2009), Getting Wasted (1980), Grow House (2017), Puff, Puff, Pass (2006), Smiley Face (2007), Up in Smoke (1978)
